question: On Wednesday, Laura wants to exercise for thrice the amount of time he did on Tuesday and Monday combined. On Monday he exercised for 32 minutes. On Tuesday he exercised for 32 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Wednesday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Monday and Tuesday he exercised a total of 64 minutes because 32 + 32 = <<32+32=64>>64
On Wednesday he has to exercise for 192 minutes because 64*3 = <<64*3=192>>192
#### 192
